Description:
Position Title:             Jr. / Sr. High School TeachersEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                         up to 3.5K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:            Dubai, UAE About the Client: A respected school based in Dubai, following Filipino curriculum offering education for KG1 to Grade 10. Job Description:  Plan, prepare, and deliver lessons for various subjects according to the Filipino curriculum guidelines. Subjects may include English, Mathematics, Science, Filipino, MAPEH (Music, Arts, Physical Education, and Health), and others.
Maintain a well-disciplined and organized classroom environment conducive to learning to ensure a positive and respectful atmosphere for students.
Design and administer assessments, quizzes, tests, and projects to evaluate students' understanding and progress of grades and attendance.
Identify the learning needs and abilities of students and differentiate instruction to accommodate diverse learning styles.
Contribute to the development and improvement of the curriculum by creating lesson plans, selecting appropriate teaching materials, and incorporating innovative teaching strategies and technologies.Skills
Skills:
Open to Filipino nationals
25 to 38 years old and below
Minimum of 1 year teaching experience or home country experience  
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Must be a Licensed Teacher in the Philippines
